languages.text: "Надеюсь, ты не нуждаешься в моем пояснении, что брать в свою свиту {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g} — это затея, прочно укрепившаяся между святотатственной ересью и невероятной глупостью? Тем более того, кто один раз уже преуспел в том, чтобы навлечь на наши головы мириад бед? Я не могу представить себе ни одной праведной причины, почему ты пош{mf|ел|ла} на такой шаг... зато неправедных — массу, и это меня пугает и настораживает".

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, ты не нуждаешься в моем пояснении, что брать в свою свиту {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g} — это затея, прочно укрепившаяся между святотатственной ересью и невероятной глупостью? Тем более того, кто один раз уже преуспел в том, чтобы навлечь на наши головы мириад бед? Я не могу представить себе ни одной праведной причины, почему ты пош{mf|ел|ла} на такой шаг... зато неправедных — массу, и это меня пугает и настораживает".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "I hope you do not need me to tell you that taking any {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} into your retinue is a stunt that falls somewhere between blasphemous heresy and incredible foolishness — let alone a Drukhari who has already succeeded in bringing myriad calamities down on our heads. I cannot imagine even one good reason why you should have taken this step... but I can think of plenty of bad ones, and that is what alarms and troubles me."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, ты не нуждаешься в моем пояснении, что брать в свою свиту {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g} — это затея, прочно укрепившаяся между святотатственной ересью и невероятной глупостью? Тем более того, кто один раз уже преуспел в том, чтобы навлечь на наши головы мириад бед? Я не могу представить себе ни одной праведной причины, почему ты пош{mf|ел|ла} на такой шаг... зато неправедных — массу, и это меня пугает и настораживает".

I cannot imagine even one good reason why you should have taken this step... but I can think of plenty of bad ones, and that is what alarms and troubles me."

I cannot imagine even one good reason why you should have taken this step... but I can think of plenty of bad ones, and that is what alarms and troubles me."

I cannot imagine even one good reason why you should have taken this step... but I can think of plenty of bad ones, and that is what alarms and troubles me."

traits.locale_text: "I hope you do not need me to tell you that taking any {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} into your retinue is a stunt that falls somewhere between blasphemous heresy and incredible foolishness — let alone a Drukhari who has already succeeded in bringing myriad calamities down on our heads. I cannot imagine even one good reason why you should have taken this step... but I can think of plenty of bad ones, and that is what alarms and troubles me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “将{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}纳入队伍中，这要么是亵渎神明的异端之举，要么是难以置信的愚行，相信这些话已经不需要我告诉你了。更何况，就是这个黑暗灵族给我们带来了无穷无尽的灾难。我根本想不出来，究竟是什么样的好理由，才让你做出了这样的决定……但我却想能出来很多糟糕的理由，这就是让我烦恼、担忧的问题。”
languages.original_text: "I hope you do not need me to tell you that taking any {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} into your retinue is a stunt that falls somewhere between blasphemous heresy and incredible foolishness — let alone a Drukhari who has already succeeded in bringing myriad calamities down on our heads. I cannot imagine even one good reason why you should have taken this step... but I can think of plenty of bad ones, and that is what alarms and troubles me."

traits.locale_text: “将{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}纳入队伍中，这要么是亵渎神明的异端之举，要么是难以置信的愚行，相信这些话已经不需要我告诉你了。更何况，就是这个黑暗灵族给我们带来了无穷无尽的灾难。我根本想不出来，究竟是什么样的好理由，才让你做出了这样的决定……但我却想能出来很多糟糕的理由，这就是让我烦恼、担忧的问题。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I hope you do not need me to tell you that taking any Drukhari into your retinue is a stunt that falls somewhere between blasphemous heresy and incredible foolishness — let alone a Drukhari who has already succeeded in bringing myriad calamities down on our heads. I cannot imagine even one good reason why you should have taken this step... but I can think of plenty of bad ones, and that is what alarms and troubles me."

languages.text: «Espero no tener que explicarte que aceptar a un {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} en tu séquito está a medio camino entre la herejía blasfema y la estupidez suicida, especialmente cuando se trata de un Drukhari que ya nos ha causado una miríada de calamidades. No soy capaz de imaginar un solo buen motivo para que hayas tomado esa decisión... pero sí muchos malos, y eso es lo que me alarma y me preocupa».
languages.original_text: "I hope you do not need me to tell you that taking any {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} into your retinue is a stunt that falls somewhere between blasphemous heresy and incredible foolishness — let alone a Drukhari who has already succeeded in bringing myriad calamities down on our heads. I cannot imagine even one good reason why you should have taken this step... but I can think of plenty of bad ones, and that is what alarms and troubles me."

traits.locale_text: «Espero no tener que explicarte que aceptar a un {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} en tu séquito está a medio camino entre la herejía blasfema y la estupidez suicida, especialmente cuando se trata de un Drukhari que ya nos ha causado una miríada de calamidades. No soy capaz de imaginar un solo buen motivo para que hayas tomado esa decisión... pero sí muchos malos, y eso es lo que me alarma y me preocupa».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}をあなたの従者に加えることは、冒涜的な異端と信じがたい愚かさの狭間にある行為だ。敢えて言うまでもなかろう。すでに無数の災難を我々の頭上にもたらすことに成功したデュカーリは言うに及ばない。あなたがこのような行為に踏み切る正当性を全く思い描けない…だが、これによって生じるであろう悪い結果ならば、いくらでも思いつけよう」
languages.original_text: "I hope you do not need me to tell you that taking any {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} into your retinue is a stunt that falls somewhere between blasphemous heresy and incredible foolishness — let alone a Drukhari who has already succeeded in bringing myriad calamities down on our heads. I cannot imagine even one good reason why you should have taken this step... but I can think of plenty of bad ones, and that is what alarms and troubles me."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}をあなたの従者に加えることは、冒涜的な異端と信じがたい愚かさの狭間にある行為だ。敢えて言うまでもなかろう。すでに無数の災難を我々の頭上にもたらすことに成功したデュカーリは言うに及ばない。あなたがこのような行為に踏み切る正当性を全く思い描けない…だが、これによって生じるであろう悪い結果ならば、いくらでも思いつけよう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, ich muss Euch nicht sagen, dass es irgendwo zwischen ketzerischer Blasphemie und unglaublicher Torheit liegt, einen {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} in Euer Gefolge aufzunehmen — noch dazu einen Drukhari, dem es bereits gelungen ist, unzählige Katastrophen über uns hereinbrechen zu lassen. Mir fällt kein einziger guter Grund dafür ein, warum Ihr das getan haben solltet ... dafür aber reichlich schlechte Gründe, und genau das beunruhigt mich so."
languages.original_text: "I hope you do not need me to tell you that taking any {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} into your retinue is a stunt that falls somewhere between blasphemous heresy and incredible foolishness — let alone a Drukhari who has already succeeded in bringing myriad calamities down on our heads. I cannot imagine even one good reason why you should have taken this step... but I can think of plenty of bad ones, and that is what alarms and troubles me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, ich muss Euch nicht sagen, dass es irgendwo zwischen ketzerischer Blasphemie und unglaublicher Torheit liegt, einen {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} in Euer Gefolge aufzunehmen — noch dazu einen Drukhari, dem es bereits gelungen ist, unzählige Katastrophen über uns hereinbrechen zu lassen. Mir fällt kein einziger guter Grund dafür ein, warum Ihr das getan haben solltet ... dafür aber reichlich schlechte Gründe, und genau das beunruhigt mich so."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Inutile de vous dire qu'accepter un {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} dans votre entourage est un acte blasphématoire doublé d'une aberration, qui plus est un Drukhari responsable d'une myriade de calamités auxquelles nous avons dû faire face récemment. Je ne vois aucune bonne raison d'avoir pris une telle mesure... mais les mauvaises raisons ne manquent pas et c'est là ce qui m'inquiète au plus haut point. »
languages.original_text: "I hope you do not need me to tell you that taking any {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} into your retinue is a stunt that falls somewhere between blasphemous heresy and incredible foolishness — let alone a Drukhari who has already succeeded in bringing myriad calamities down on our heads. I cannot imagine even one good reason why you should have taken this step... but I can think of plenty of bad ones, and that is what alarms and troubles me."

traits.locale_text: « Inutile de vous dire qu'accepter un {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} dans votre entourage est un acte blasphématoire doublé d'une aberration, qui plus est un Drukhari responsable d'une myriade de calamités auxquelles nous avons dû faire face récemment. Je ne vois aucune bonne raison d'avoir pris une telle mesure... mais les mauvaises raisons ne manquent pas et c'est là ce qui m'inquiète au plus haut point. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Tutup da maiyetine {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} katmanın kâfirlikle düpedüz salaklık arası bir hareket olduğunu söylememe gerek olmadığını umuyorum. Hatta bu Drukhari'nin başımıza açtığı binbir musibetten hiç söz etmiyorum. Hayır, öyle bir şey yapıyorsun ki neresinden tutsam elimde kalıyor. Aklıma bir tane güzel sebep gelmiyor, bu da canımı çok sıkıyor."
languages.original_text: "I hope you do not need me to tell you that taking any {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} into your retinue is a stunt that falls somewhere between blasphemous heresy and incredible foolishness — let alone a Drukhari who has already succeeded in bringing myriad calamities down on our heads. I cannot imagine even one good reason why you should have taken this step... but I can think of plenty of bad ones, and that is what alarms and troubles me."

traits.locale_text: "Tutup da maiyetine {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g} katmanın kâfirlikle düpedüz salaklık arası bir hareket olduğunu söylememe hiç gerek yok, diye umuyorum. Hatta bu Drukhari'nin başımıza açtığı binbir musibetten hiç söz etmiyorum. Hayır, öyle bir şey yapıyorsun ki, neresinden tutsam elimde kalıyor. Aklıma bir tane güzel sebep gelmiyor, bu da canımı çok sıkıyor."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
